contributionDescription: I have make a many transaction on Optimism Chain and make contribution for growth in Optimism Ecosystem. I an airdrop hunter and make a various retroactive for any chain and primarily in Optimism Mainnet. I have done delegate OP and join for voting in governance activity. Wish me luck!

impactDescription: As airdrop hunter. I was make a chance for Optimism Chain TVL growth significally because my contribution i join for a long time since 2020 until now i am still active user in Optimism Chain and make Optimism Ecosystems change to have a bright future
pwFlaggedReason: Yes, this application should be flagged as it violated rule 10 (outside of the RetroPGF scope) by attributing the contributions solely to sending transactions on OP Mainnet which is clearly stated as not in scope to be rewarded in RetroPGF 3.
pwCategorySuggestions: Web3 Community Platform, Optimism Ecosystem, Governance & Tokens
